alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Carroll; Douglas; Floyd; Haralson; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Paulding, northeastern Haralson, eastern Carroll, western Douglas, southeastern Floyd, Polk and southwestern Bartow Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Cedartown to near Draketown to near Villa Rica to near Lowell, and moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Rome, Douglasville, Cartersville, Dallas, Cedartown, Villa Rica, Temple, Rockmart, Euharlee, Hiram, Aragon, Cave Spring, Kingston, Braswell, Taylorsville, Yorkville, Burnt Hickory Ridge, Seaton Lake, Fairplay and Draketown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Bartow; Carroll; Douglas; Floyd; Haralson; Paulding; Polk
